dialogue.User: I'd like to get notified via email when there's a safety issue with my car.

dialogue.System: Ok, I understand you want an email notification about car safety issues. But from which source do you want me to check for these issues?
dialogue.User: Please monitor new open recalls from NHTSA and send me an email when one is issued.

dialogue.System: Considering you want email notifications for new open recalls, do you also need me to specify a query and a source for those recalls?
dialogue.User: Yes, I’d like an update when there's something about strawberries.

dialogue.System: Ok, so you want updates about strawberries. Considering this, do you need me to specify a source for these alerts?
dialogue.User: Yes, I’d like an update when there's something about 'Frozen Strawberries - Potential Listeria Contamination' from the Department of Agriculture with a Query (Text input > Other).

dialogue.System: Once a potential contamination like 'Frozen Strawberries - Potential Listeria Contamination' is detected by the Department of Agriculture, what should I do with the recall information – specifically regarding the subject and message content?
dialogue.User: I want to be informed when there’s an alert about it. It would be great if you could send me a notification.

dialogue.System: You mentioned wanting a notification about the alert. To ensure I deliver it correctly, could you tell me where this notification should be sent?
dialogue.User:
Send the recall information via email with subject 'Recall Alert: Frozen Strawberries' and body '

Dear Recipient,

The Department of Agriculture has issued a recall for frozen strawberries due to potential Listeria contamination. Please see the attached link for more details and safety instructions.

Sincerely,
Department of Agriculture Recall Notification System

'.

Belief State.action_fields_values:
'Recall Alert: Frozen Strawberries', '

Dear Recipient,

The Department of Agriculture has issued a recall for frozen strawberries due to potential Listeria contamination. Please see the attached link for more details and safety instructions.

Sincerely,
Department of Agriculture Recall Notification System

'
Belief State.action_fields: Subject (Text input > Title), Body (Text input > HTML)

dialogue.User: I want to set up a rule based on events from my Home Connect Cookit device.

dialogue.System: Considering your Home Connect Cookit device started cooking, do you want to identify a specific ID and define what should happen next?
dialogue.User: Yes, I’d like it to notify me when that happens.

dialogue.System: Ok, so you want a notification when Cookit starts cooking with a specific ID. Which ID are we looking at?
dialogue.User: The ID is 'kitchen'. I want to monitor Cookit started events on the 'Ha ID' field with value 'kitchen', and notify me when that happens.

dialogue.System: Great! So we're tracking Cookit starting with ID 'kitchen'. Now, regarding notifications on your Android Device, how would you like to receive them and what details should be included?
dialogue.User: I’d like a sound notification when it starts, maybe something cheerful.

dialogue.System: Ok, you want a cheerful sound notification when Cookit starts on your Android Device. But what kind of notification do you want to send? What should it contain?
dialogue.User: I’d like a sound notification when it starts, maybe something cheerful. The action channel is 'Android Device' with title 'Send Notification', and the fields are empty.

dialogue.System: Great! So you want to use your Android Device to play music when Cookit starts. What song or playlist would you like to play? And how long should it play for?
dialogue.User: I think a cheerful tune would be good, something upbeat. Maybe just loop it until I stop it.

dialogue.System: Ok, I see you want music to play when something happens on Facebook. But what specifically on Facebook should trigger this? And do you have any specific requirements for the hashtag or photo content?
dialogue.User: When a new photo is posted on Facebook with the hashtag '#sunset', please play the "Happy Vibes" playlist on my Spotify account.

dialogue.System: Great! So you want to play music when a new photo with '#sunset' is posted on Facebook. Are there any specific details about *how* this music should be played? For instance, do you have a preferred volume or device?
dialogue.User: No, there are no specific details about how the music should be played. Just play it when a new photo with '#sunset' is posted.
I want to receive tomorrow’s weather report via email.

dialogue.System: Great! Which Gmail account should I use to send you the weather report?
dialogue.User: I would like you to use Gmail.

dialogue.System: Okay, and regarding the email details - who else should I copy or blind carbon copy on this weather report? Also, what subject line would you prefer for the email, and do you want to include an attachment?
dialogue.User: Just send it to me, that's all. I don’t really care about the subject.

dialogue.System: Okay, so you want me to send this weather report only to yourself. But what about the subject line? Any preferences there?
dialogue.User: Let's use "Tomorrow's Weather in Los Angeles" as the subject and don’t add any CC or BCC recipients. The attachment URL is https://www.example.com/weather_report.pdf.

Belief State.action_fields_values:
'john.doe@example.com', '', '', 'Tomorrow\'s Weather in Los Angeles', '

Hi John,

Just wanted to let you know the weather forecast for tomorrow in Los Angeles:

Expect sunny skies with a high of 75°F and a low of 60°F.

Have a great day!

', 'https://www.example.com/weather_report.pdf'
Belief State.action_fields: To (Text input > Other), Cc (Text input > Other), Bcc (Text input > Other), Subject (Text input > Title), Body (Text input > HTML), Attachment URL (Text input > File)

dialogue.System: So, when would you like me to start monitoring for this weather report and where are you interested in receiving updates from?
dialogue.User: I want to monitor starting at 08:00 near Los Angeles, specifically at coordinates 34.0522° N, 118.2437° W.

Belief State.action_fields_values:
'john.doe@example.com', '', '', 'Tomorrow\'s Weather in Los Angeles', '

Hi John,

Just wanted to let you know the weather forecast for tomorrow in Los Angeles:

Expect sunny skies with a high of 75°F and a low of 60°F.

Have a great day!

', 'https://www.example.com/weather_report.pdf'
Belief State.action_fields: To (Text input > Other), Cc (Text input > Other), Bcc (Text input > Other), Subject (Text input > Title), Body (Text input > HTML), Attachment URL (Text input > File)

dialogue.User: I want to receive an IFTTT app notification whenever the trigger is activated.

Belief State.action_title: Send a notification from the IFTTT app

dialogue.System: Great! Now that you want to send a notification via IFTTT, could you tell me what message you’d like to include in this notification?
dialogue.User: Just something simple saying an event occurred.

Belief State.action_title: Send a notification from the IFTTT app

dialogue.System: Ok, so you want a simple notification when an event occurs. Do you have a specific message text in mind for that notification?
dialogue.User: The message should be “☀️ Good morning! Today in London, it's going to be sunny with a high of 25°C. Enjoy your day!”.

Belief State.action_title: Send a notification from the IFTTT app
Belief State.action_fields_values: '☀️ Good morning! Today in London, it\'s going to be sunny with a high of 25°C. Enjoy your day!'

dialogue.System: Considering you want a daily weather report, at what time and for which location would you like to receive it?
dialogue.User: I'd like to get it in the morning, somewhere in Europe.

Belief State.action_title: Send a notification from the IFTTT app
Belief State.action_fields_values: '☀️ Good morning! Today in London, it\'s going to be sunny with a high of 25°C. Enjoy your day!'

dialogue.System: You mentioned "in the morning" and "somewhere in Europe". Could you be more specific about when and where you’d like this report?
dialogue.User: I'd like to get it at 08:00 for London, UK.

Belief State.action_title: Send a notification from the IFTTT app

dialogue.User: I want to post any new item on Twitter.

dialogue.System: From which Pocket account do you want to track new items?
dialogue.User: I want to track any new item saved on my main Pocket account.

dialogue.System: So, when a new item is saved on your Pocket account, do you want me to automatically create a tweet with it? What kind of message would you like to be included in that tweet?
dialogue.User: Yes, please share any interesting articles I save! Maybe just something simple like "Check this out!".

dialogue.System: Ok, so you want me to share articles from Pocket on Twitter with a simple message. But how should I handle the image associated with the article? Should it be included in the tweet?
dialogue.User: Yes, include the image! Here's everything: action_fields are 'Tweet (Text input), Photo URL (Text input > Photo)', action_title is 'Post a tweet with image', and action_fields_values are 'Just saved an interesting article on Pocket! Check it out ➡️ [link to article]', 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1503023345310-bd7c9bc5eb99?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8Mnx8bGFuZHNjYXBlfGVufDB8fHx8MA%3D%3D'.

Belief State.action_fields: Tweet (Text input), Photo URL (Text input > Photo)
